title: Address: 14419 E Montana Circle #B, Centennial, CO 80012 Rent: $2300 B
posting_body: Address: 14419 E Montana Circle #B, Centennial, CO 80012
Rent: $2300
Bedrooms: 3
Bathrooms: 2
Available: MID AUGUST 2022!!
Type: Duplex
Spacious 3 bedroom 2 bathroom duplex in the Hallmark neighborhood.
The home features open space living, private yard, attached shared garage parking and washer and dryer in the unit.
Private fenced backyard with large deck.
New flooring and paint throughout the unit.
Quick access to DIA, public transit and shops and restaurants.
Don't miss out on this opportunity to call this home!
** We're looking for a tenant with 2 years positive rental history and 2.5x's the rent in income.
We also check credit and criminal records.
If there is an issue anywhere on the application you may be required to pay a larger deposit.
There is a $55 monthly utility fee covering water, sewer and trash.
There is a $40 application fee for this property.
For showings please contact the leasing line at
show contact info
INCO Property Management & Sales
Leasing Department
6640 S Broadway Suite A
Centennial, CO 80121
show contact info
